name: spelon-berry
effect: No effect; only useful for planting and cooking.
short_effect: Used for creating PokéBlocks and Poffins.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A Poffin ingredient. Bury it in soft soil to grow a Spelon Plant.
flavor_text.platinum: A Poffin ingredient. Bury it in soft soil to grow a Spelon Plant.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: In the Sinnoh region, they like to make sweets known as Poffins with this Berry and feed them to their Pokémon.
